page.title: 06LOCAL EVENTS IN MERSEYSIDE
page.content: At 2 p.m. on Poolbank field, 6th July 1985,{Church Drive Primary School's Summer fair took place. First of all all the{Morris Dancers,}the{Country {Dancers,}the Boys Brigade band and the {Rose Queen}and her{Attendants}walked up the road to the field. About 5 minuntes later it was opened. Everyone was around the stalls buying things. There were stocks and refreshments,craft stalls and a coconut shy and lots of other stalls. The B.B. Band played and then we watched the{Country Dancers}and{Morris {Dancers.} It was a lovely day and the sun was shining. Yesterday 29th June at the Oval there was a{pagent}of {Guides}and{Brownies.} The display was to celebrate 75 years of the association. At the end of the of the service a band played the national anthem. The road was full of traffic.
